no less.translation[0].definitions[0].de: used to emphasize that an amount or number is large
no less.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: By 1977, the USA was importing no less than 45% of its oil.
no less.translation[0].definitions[1].de: used to emphasize that the person or thing you are talking about is important or impressive
no less.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Our awards were presented by the mayor, no less.
The message came from no less a person than the prime minister.
